it.by.library.dao.impl

Class JournalDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.by.library.dao.BaseDao<Journal>
      • it.by.library.dao.impl.JournalDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<Journal>, IJournalDao

    @Repository
public class JournalDaoImpl
extends BaseDao<Journal>
implements IJournalDao
    The class extends the standard DAO methods for journal. It adds methods for extracting a list of all positions from journal, a list of all positions from journal by name of user, a list of positions where books weren't returned, a list of positions where books were returned, a list of all positions from journal by book
    Author:
    Ilya
